Description: * Outer {{PageRef|Zipline|alt_name={{PageRef|Zipline|alt_name=zipline}}s}} hero speed increased by 20% relative to inner lanes (same as troopers on outer lanes {{PageRef|Zipline|alt_name=zipline}} being faster)
* Fixed {{PageRef|Wraith}} Cards, {{PageRef|Shiv}} Rage and lifesteal from increasing by shooting the shop
